title: Qualcomm confirms launch event on May 20, likely for Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 Plus
content:
Qualcomm has confirmed, at least via its social media, that there will be a launch event this Friday, May 20, to launch a new Snapdragon chipset.

moreâ€¦

The post Qualcomm confirms launch event on May 20, likely for Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 Plus appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The next Snapdragon chips, the Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 Plus and 7 Gen 1, are set to debut at a Qualcomm event on May 20, the company has confirmed
